name: Pokemon Project Aura
description:
I have been interested in Unreal Engine since I started using UE4 while I was studying Computer Science. Last year, when UE5 came out, I decided to make use of my new PC and start learning the game engine on my own and since I have also been a Soulsborne fan and specially a Pokemon one for a long time, mixing those two topics in a single videogame was a huge motivation for me.

I do not want to earn money by making this video, I just want whoever faces it to see what is my vision about how Pokemon games could be done in the future and enjoy it above all.

Game content:

- Character animations - GhostSamurai_Katana - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ghostsamurai-katana.

- Sword mesh - Assortment of Swords - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/assortment-of-swords.

- Environment - Stylized Forest - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-forest-03.

- Visual effects - Luo's Eight elements - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/luos-s-eight-elements | FX Variety Pack - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/a36bac8b05004e999dd4b1d33... | Character Appearance and Dissolve - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/character-appearance-and-... | Material Function Collection - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/material-function-collect....

- Sound effects - https://freesound.org/ | Ultimate Magic Sounds Spell Sounds - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/magic-sfx-pro.

- Music - Bliitzit channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdtyiulxiOjdoKzldBzIcLg.

- Whole programming has been implemented from scratch by me.

- All Pokemon models, animations, music and sound effects belong to Nintendo and The Pokemon Company.

Also, many thanks to all those YouTube tutorials (I cannot remember them all) I have been following throughout these months in order to overcome the development obstacles :)
